name: part_000
file: tmp_【#ひろがるホロライブDAY1】hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade hololive stage DAY1【チラ見せ】 [Of2b9eBHFS4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening wait screen for hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade Stage DAY1 with the main visual and event hashtag.
Introduction slide for hololive SUPER EXPO 2023 and hololive 4th fes. merchandise lineup.
Merchandise showcase for hololive product lineup, including 3D acrylic stands and badges.
Merchandise showcase for Holostars and Holostars EN items.
Merchandise showcase for the hololive production Art Collection.
Merchandise showcase for hololive office-themed goods.
Merchandise showcase for hololive alternative (HOLOALT) items.
Merchandise showcase for collaboration items with MANGART BEAMS.
Merchandise showcase for holo*27 collaboration items.
Merchandise showcase for BUSHIROAD collaboration items.
Merchandise showcase for GOOD SMILE COMPANY items.
Official event items for hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade.
Visual guide for penlight colors for all hololive members.
Digital message board featuring comments and illustrations from fans for hololive SUPER EXPO 2023.
